Organization Name: ALZHEIMERS ASSOCIATION - NORTH CENTRAL TEXAS CHAPTER | MAIN OFFICE | CARE PLANNING, SUPPORT, AND CONSULTATION
Keywords: Medical Services, General Health Education Programs
Description: Provides a 24-hour telephone helpline, education programs, support groups, information and referral, weekly e-newsletter, and 24/7 wandering support for a safe return.

Organization Name: MAROON 9 COMMUNITY ENRICHMENT ORGANIZATION | MAIN OFFICE | SICKLE CELL SUPPORT SERVICES
Keywords: Medical Services, General Health Education Programs
Description: Provides health education and public awareness of sickle cell disease through blood drives and bone marrow testing sites. Offers monthly support groups and financial assistance (depending on funds) for basic needs (mortgage, rent, and utilties) to individuals with sick cell disease.By making this referral, we know you fit the basic eligibility for this service. However, the referral to this agency is not a guarantee of assistance.Note: The agency does assists with deposit, reconnection or late fees when funds are available.

Organization Name: SOMERVELL COUNTY | EXTENSION OFFICE | TEXAS A&M AGRILIFE
Keywords: Medical Services, General Health Education Programs
Description: Offers nutrition and health education and youth education program (4-H program).

Organization Name: OPEN ARMS HEALTH CLINIC | CLINIC | HEALTH/MEDICAL CARE
Keywords: Medical Services, General Health Education Programs
Description: Offers free healthcare services such as health education, chronic disease management (hypertension, diabetes, etc.) as well as non-emergency problems such as sore throats, ear aches and more. Counseling is also offered. Does not provide dental, prenatal care, childhood immunizations or diagnosis/treatment of STDs.

Organization Name: TEXAS HEALTH HUGULEY CENTER FORT WORTH SOUTH | FORT WORTH SOUTH OFFICE | HEALTH EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
Keywords: Medical Services, General Health Education Programs
Description: Offers seminars in weight management, prepared childbirth, diabetic class, cardiac rehabilitation, Older Adults wellness, women's health. Mobile services and fitness memberships available.
